card.name: 0 - Inverted Fool
card.description: Pack your stuff and let's go

card.name: I - Inverted Magician
card.description: Overwhelm them with magic

card.name: II - Inverted High Priestess
card.description: You sure about this?

card.name: III - Inverted Empress
card.description: You are just like your mother

card.name: IV - Inverted Emperor
card.description: Yesterday's enemies are today's friends

card.name: V - Inverted Hierophant
card.description: Two prayers for the devil

card.name: VI - Inverted Lovers
card.description: Will you sacrifice your loved ones?

card.name: VII - Inverted Chariot
card.description: May your enemies stand in fear

card.name: VIII - Inverted Justice
card.description: May it help bring you justice

card.name: IX - Inverted Hermit
card.description: One man's trash is another man's treasure

card.name: X - Inverted Wheel Of Fortune
card.description: Feeling lucky?

card.name: XI - Inverted Strength
card.description: May you be stronger than your enemies

card.name: XII - Inverted Hanged Man
card.description: Take from the rich and make yourself richer

card.name: XIII - Inverted Death
card.description: Become friends with The Death

card.name: XIV - Inverted Temperance
card.description: Blood = Power

card.name: XV - Inverted Devil
card.description: Treasure tainted in blood

card.name: XVI - Inverted Tower
card.description: Controlled demolition

card.name: XVII - Inverted Stars
card.description: May you get something useful

card.name: XVIII - Inverted Moon
card.description: May you roll a good number

card.name: XIX - Inverted Sun
card.description: May the curse become a blessing

card.name: XX - Inverted Judgement
card.description: Confess your sins in front of God

card.name: XXI - Inverted World
card.description: The world is a dark place
